entry.title: P-Dubey294/Node.js-Express: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.
entry.content: This is a Node.js-based application built with JavaScript to provide fast, scalable, and efficient backend services. It utilizes an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, making it lightweight and ideal for real-time applications.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
entry.content: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: zxbb1190/nodedb-json: nodedb-json is a lightweight JSON file database tool designed for Electron applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, reading, querying, updating, and deleting data stored in JSON files.
